CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 7, 1965, pg. 22, reads: "Champions - Shown above are members of the Cardinals, newly crowned champions of the Homewood - Brushton Atehletic [Athletic] Association Little League. Left to right, front row: D. Thompson, K. Thompson, William King, D. James, G. Meachum and Richard Britton.  Second row:  H. Trent, D. Jenkins, J. Paxton, E. Graves, R. Fox, D. Ragland, B. Terry, R. Fluker and Troy Steward, coach.  Rear: Gerald Fox, manager, and Val Cherry, president of the HBAA. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Homewood Little League Cardinals "Cards" baseball team, front row from left: Kevin Thompson, Darryl Thompson, William King, D. James, G. Meachum, Richard Britton; H. Trent, D. Jenkins, J. Paxton, E. Graves, Richard C. Fox Sr., D. Ragland, B. Terry, R. Fluker, coach Troy Steward; rear: manager Gerald W. Fox, and Val Cherry, posed in front of William "Woogie" Harris' house, 7101 Apple Street, with woman lying on hillside in background, another version
